text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery

Product features:
Genuine Samsung branded product
This battery is NFC-enabled
Battery Type: Li-ion, Voltage: 3.8V, Capacity: 2100mAh, Item model number: EB-L1G6LLA
2100mAh battery allows you to store power necessary to keep your device charged throughout the day
text.Response A: This battery is for Samsung Galaxy S3. It has a 2100mAh battery which is enough to keep your device charged throughout the day. It is genuine Samsung branded product. It is NFC-enabled.
text.Response B: Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery is a genuine OEM product. This means that it is made by the original manufacturer of the device. This battery is NFC-enabled. This battery is Li-ion, with a voltage of 3.8V and a capacity of 2100mAh. This battery is the exact replacement for the Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM battery.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

876.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery

Product features:
Genuine Samsung branded product
This battery is NFC-enabled
Battery Type: Li-ion, Voltage: 3.8V, Capacity: 2100mAh, Item model number: EB-L1G6LLA
2100mAh battery allows you to store power necessary to keep your device charged throughout the day

Response A

This battery is for Samsung Galaxy S3. It has a 2100mAh battery which is enough to keep your device charged throughout the day. It is genuine Samsung branded product. It is NFC-enabled.

Response B

Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery is a genuine OEM product. This means that it is made by the original manufacturer of the device. This battery is NFC-enabled. This battery is Li-ion, with a voltage of 3.8V and a capacity of 2100mAh. This battery is the exact replacement for the Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM battery.
